com.przemekm.coreservicesapp.controllers

Class MainWindow

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.przemekm.coreservicesapp.controllers.MainWindow

  • public class MainWindow
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is a controller for the main window of the application.
    Author:
    Przemysław Motała

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public void initialize()
        This method is called when MainWindow is being created.

        Its purpose is to call the H2Database.getInstance() method, set the parameters of ordersTable columns and populate a containerBox with specified elements.

        A listener is added to the ListView of reports. When you select a Report, the tempLabel is replaced with containerBox in the mainPane and the selected Report is loaded with displayReport(Report) method. Also, a specified action is added to the saveButton, which occurs when the button is clicked - the method saveReport(Report) is called.

        See Also:
        H2Database.getInstance(), TableColumn, TableView, VBox, displayReport(Report), saveReport(Report)

      • loadOrdersDialog

        public void loadOrdersDialog()
        This method opens the FileChooser dialog used for loading files with orders.

        The allowed file types are CSV and XML. Depending on which one is chosen, two methods are being called: loadCSV(File) or loadXML(File). User can choose multiple files at once. After loading the files, the loadDataFromDatabase() method is called.

        See Also:
        loadDataFromDatabase(), loadCSV(File), loadXML(File)

      • generateReportsDialog

        public void generateReportsDialog()
        Creates a dialog window used for generating reports.

        When the user clicks the "OK" button, the GenerateReports controller class is instantiated and the GenerateReports.getReportParams() method is called. The received ReportParams are then passed into the H2Database.getQueryData(ReportParams) method, which generates the chosen report.

        See Also:
        Dialog, FXMLLoader, Optional, GenerateReports, ReportParams, H2Database.getQueryData(ReportParams)

      • displayReport

        private void displayReport(Report<?> selectedReport)
        Displays a report chosen from the reportsList.

        If the data in the report is an instance of ArrayList, then it's displayed as list of contained Order entities. Else, if the data in the report is an instance of String, it's displayed as a label and a single value.

        Parameters:
        selectedReport - the report chosen by the user from the reportsList.
        See Also:
        Order, Report

      • saveReport

        private void saveReport(Report<?> selectedReport)
        This method saves a report chosen from the reportsList.

        A FileChooser dialog is opened and the user can type the name of a new file. The file type is set as CSV. The content of the file is same as the one displayed with method displayReport(Report).

        Parameters:
        selectedReport - the report chosen by the user from the reportsList.
        See Also:
        FileChooser, Order, Report

      • loadDataFromDatabase

        private void loadDataFromDatabase()
        This method loads all data from the database into the loadedOrders list.
        See Also:
        H2Database.getAllData()

      • loadCSV

        private boolean loadCSV(java.io.File file)
        This method loads data from the CSV file.

        Each line of proper data is saved in a H2 database with use of H2Database.saveData(Order) method. If the file has no proper data or one of the lines is in a wrong format, an IllegalArgumentException is caught and a message is displayed.

        It is assumed that the format of CSV file is as follows: 

         
      Client_Id,Request_Id,Name,Quantity,Price
      String,long,String,int,BigDecimal
        Parameters:
        file - the File to read from.
        Returns:
        true if the file has at least one line of data in proper format.
        See Also:
        H2Database.saveData(Order), BufferedReader, InputStreamReader, FileInputStream

      • loadXML

        private boolean loadXML(java.io.File file)
        This method loads data from the XML file.

        Each line of proper data is saved in a H2 database with use of H2Database.saveData(Order) method. If the file has missing tags inside <request> tag or the loaded data is in a wrong format, an IllegalArgumentException is caught and a message is displayed.

        It is assumed that the format of XML file is as follows: 

         
     <requests>
         <request>
             <clientId>String</clientId>
             <requestId>long</requestId>
             <name>String</name>
             <quantity>int</quantity>
             <price>BigDecimal</price>
         </request>
     </requests>
        Parameters:
        file - the File to read from.
        Returns:
        true if the file has at least one batch of data in proper format.
        See Also:
        H2Database.saveData(Order), DocumentBuilderFactory, Document
